content: k 16 sts round 2 *kfb k to 2 sts remaining on tn kfb k1* repeat * to * for bn 4 sts increased © 2023 yarn twisters 2 simple worsted socks heel round 16 tn k bn k1 k2tog k to 2 sts remaining ssk round 1 tn k across 20 sts bn kfb k to 2 round 17 tn k bn k2tog k to end sts remaining kfb k1 22 sts round 2 tn k across bn k across heel is now complete and st count is back to rnds 3 to 18 repeat rnds 1 and 2 eight 40 20 sts on each needle more times tn 20 sts bn 38 sts on the 18th round place a st marker in the middle of the sts leg on the bn 19 sts on either side of the marker round 1 tn k1 p1 bn k1 p1 rnds 2 to 45 repeat round 1 forty-four more turn heel times or until leg measures appox 6 15cm you will now be working back and forth on the finishing bn only set up k across tn bind off using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind row 1 k to 2 sts beyond the marker ssk k1 off or with whatever stretchy bind off you turn work pull the yarn tight prefer row 2 sl1 p to 2 st beyond the marker p2tog p1 turn work pull the yarn tight to work a 1x1 ribbed knit 1 purl 1 bind off row 3 sl1 k to 1 st before the gap ssk k the prep a knit stitch reverse yo k1 pass yo over sts before and after the gap together k1 turn knit stitch then prep a purl stitch yo p1 row 4 sl1 p to 1 st before gap p2tog p the pass yo over purl stitch then pass the sts before and after the gap together p1 turn second stitch on the needle over the first one row 5 to 14 repeat row 3 and 4 five repeat to end more times row 15 sl1 k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 weave in ends note you will now start to knit in the round © 2023 yarn twisters 3 simple worsted socks
